name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do Not Merge WIP for GitHub

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You do not merge *WIP* pull request!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can't merge *WIP* pull request!

Usage:
- Put [wip] or [Do Not Merge] on the title of the pull request
- It works!
